comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Carlos José Solórzano Gutiérrez (17 January 1860 Managua - 30 August1936 San José, Costa Rica) was the 58th President of Nicaragua between 1 January 1925 and 14 March 1926. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carlos_Jos%C3%A9_Sol%C3%B3rzano

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: It looks as though this photo was used as the basis for anofficial portrait. See www.mined.gob.ni/gobern31.php

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Date written on the negative is 1/17/25.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Actually, I didn't.  I meant 1/17/25 (which would be just after he became president).  When I downloaded the high-res image and flipped it, it seemed like a "2" to me.  But I agree that it could be either.
